text: ‘‘i pranigala garbhadallenideyo adu kevala nam'ma purusarige matra misalagide. Nam'ma patniyara palige avu nisid'dhavagive. Innu avu mrta sthitiyalli janisidare matra avaru adaralli paludararaguvaru’’ endu avaru heluttare. (I riti) sullugalannu srstisiddara pratiphalavannu avanu (allahanu) avarige niduvanu. Avanantu apara yuktivantanu jnaniyu agiruvanu
